name: capstone-project-team-7
description: ```text ├── backend │   └── src │       ├── analyzer/ │       ├── api/ │       ├── auth/ │       ├── scanner/ │       ├── storage/ │       └── main.py ├── docs │   ├── assets/ │   ├── WBS.md │   ├── dfd.md │   ├── systemArchitecture.md │   ├── projectProposal.md │   ├── projectRequirements.md ├── tests ├── docker-compose.yml └── README.md ```

scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend,electron "cd backend && uvicorn src.main:app --reload" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd electron && ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run dev"
scripts.preview:desktop: npm run export --workspace frontend && npm run build --workspace electron && npm run start --workspace electron
